# verticalAlignment

**Instance Property**

The vertical alignment of the text block.

## Declaration

```swift
var verticalAlignment: NSTextBlock.VerticalAlignment { get set }
```

## Getting and setting alignment

- **NSTextBlock.VerticalAlignment**: The following constants specify values used by the property [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextBlock/verticalAlignment-swift.property] to specify vertical alignment.
